text: Caterina Valente (14 January 1931 â€“ 9 September 2024) was a Italian-French- German singer, guitarist and dancer. She performed alongside Bing Crosby, Dean Martin, Perry Como, and Ella Fitzgerald. Her best known single was "Bongo cha cha cha" (1959). In 1959, she was nominated for a Grammy Award. Valente died in Lugano, Switzerland on 9 September 2024, at the age of 93. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Caterina Valente recordings at the Discography of American Historical Recordings. * Discography * * Photographs and literature Category:1931 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Italian singers Category:Italian guitarists Category:Italian dancers Category:French guitarists Category:French dancers Category:German guitarists Category:German singers Category:Singers from Paris Category:Musicians from Paris
title: Caterina Valente
